title: r/Maliciouscompliance Karen Gets Instant Karma!
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, a spoiled rich woman Karen thinks that she can put her gross hands all over the bread at a super market. OP calls her out on it, and of course the Karen freaks out and demands to see a manager. The manager shows up, but he actually makes Karen buy all of the bread she touched in a moment of instant karma! If you like this content, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
